alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 9:13AM AKST until February 16 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation is occurring. Total ice accumulations between one to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow and freezing drizzle continues to fall across the western Kenai Peninsula. Freezing drizzle is expected to continue through the early evening before colder air begins to move back over the region and the precipitation transitions back to snow or a rain/snow mix before ending by mid-afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
